name: black-haze-syntax

0.1.0.name: black-haze-syntax
0.1.0.description: An ATOM theme specifically catered towards Titanium Development (JS, XML, TSS). The color choices were largely based off of the Aurora theme from Sublime Text.

readme:
# black-haze-syntax theme An ATOM theme specifically catered towards Titanium Development (JS, XML, TSS). The color choices were largely based off of the Aurora theme from Sublime Text. Methods and comments example
Variable declaration example
Example of XML/HTML
An example snippet of a tss
